Name: Sumeru City
Title: The City Where All Wisdom Resides
Desc: Under the luxuriant Divine Tree, the sages of the academy city have accumulated all the knowledge there is to be gathered.

Talent.Name: Sumeru City
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or your character uses a Skill:</color> If you do not have more Elemental Dice than cards in your hand, spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
